teens.name: Orlando
teens.description: Home to world-famous theme parks, thrilling rides, and magical experiences for unforgettable family fun.

teens.name: Tokyo
teens.description: Vibrant metropolis blending futuristic technology, ancient traditions, and pop culture. Safe and exciting.

teens.name: Barcelona
teens.description: Lively city with stunning architecture, beautiful beaches, and delicious tapas. Great for exploring.

teens.name: London
teens.description: Iconic landmarks, world-class museums, West End shows, and diverse neighborhoods to explore.

teens.name: Amsterdam
teens.description: Picturesque canals, historic architecture, and famous museums. Explore by bike for unique views.

teens.name: San Diego
teens.description: Sunny beaches, famous zoo, Legoland, and a relaxed vibe make it ideal for youthful fun.

twenties.name: Bangkok
twenties.description: Buzzing city of temples, street food, vibrant nightlife, and endless markets. Adventure awaits!

twenties.name: Lisbon
twenties.description: Historic charm meets vibrant nightlife. Explore hilly streets, Fado music, and stunning viewpoints.

twenties.name: Berlin
twenties.description: A city steeped in history with an unparalleled art scene, techno clubs, and diverse culture.

twenties.name: Medellín
twenties.description: The 'City of Eternal Spring' offers lively nightlife, stunning mountain views, and a thriving art scene.

twenties.name: Hanoi
twenties.description: Ancient capital with rich history, delicious street food, bustling Old Quarter, and serene lakes.

twenties.name: Mexico City
twenties.description: A dynamic metropolis with ancient ruins, world-class museums, delicious cuisine, and vibrant markets.

thirties.name: Kyoto
thirties.description: Ancient capital renowned for its temples, serene gardens, geishas, and exquisite traditional dining.

thirties.name: Rome
thirties.description: Walk through history, marvel at ancient ruins, iconic art, and indulge in world-class Italian cuisine.

thirties.name: Reykjavik
thirties.description: Gateway to stunning natural wonders: geysers, hot springs, northern lights, and unique landscapes.

thirties.name: Cape Town
thirties.description: Iconic Table Mountain, pristine beaches, vibrant culture, and world-class wine regions nearby.

thirties.name: Paris
thirties.description: The City of Love, famous for its romantic ambiance, iconic landmarks, fine dining, and art.

thirties.name: Maui
thirties.description: Tropical paradise with stunning beaches, volcanic landscapes, and opportunities for relaxation or adventure.

forties.name: Florence
forties.description: Renaissance art and architecture, charming streets, delectable Tuscan cuisine, and fine wines.

forties.name: Bordeaux
forties.description: World capital of wine, offering vineyard tours, gourmet dining, and elegant city exploration.

forties.name: Queenstown
forties.description: Adventure capital amidst stunning landscapes, offering luxury stays, fine dining, and outdoor activities.

forties.name: Napa Valley
forties.description: Premier wine region, perfect for vineyard tours, gourmet dining, and luxurious relaxation.

forties.name: Amalfi Coast
forties.description: Dramatic coastline, picturesque towns, exquisite seafood, and stunning panoramic views.

forties.name: Ubud
forties.description: Bali's cultural heart, offering serene rice paddies, spiritual retreats, and vibrant artisan markets.

fifties.name: Santorini
fifties.description: Iconic white-washed villages, stunning sunsets, caldera views, and exquisite Greek cuisine.

fifties.name: Vancouver Island
fifties.description: Rugged coastline, ancient forests, charming towns, and gourmet food experiences. Serene and beautiful.

fifties.name: Buenos Aires
fifties.description: 'Paris of South America,' famous for tango, vibrant culture, European architecture, and delicious steaks.

fifties.name: Dubrovnik
fifties.description: Historic walled city, stunning Adriatic Sea views, and rich cultural heritage. Perfect for exploration.

fifties.name: Edinburgh
fifties.description: Historic castle, cobbled streets, vibrant arts scene, and rich Scottish heritage. Explore at leisure.

fifties.name: Siem Reap
fifties.description: Gateway to Angkor Wat, offering ancient temple complexes, rich history, and spiritual experiences.

monthly.name: Kyoto
monthly.description: Experience vibrant autumn foliage, mild weather, and traditional Japanese culture in its ancient capital.

monthly.name: Marrakech
monthly.description: Enjoy comfortable, mild weather for exploring bustling souks, palaces, and vibrant Djemaa el-Fna square.

monthly.name: Dubai
monthly.description: Ideal weather for exploring futuristic architecture, luxury shopping, and desert adventures.

monthly.name: Sydney
monthly.description: Spring brings pleasant temperatures, sunny beaches, and vibrant city life. Perfect for outdoor activities.

monthly.name: El Calafate
monthly.description: Gateway to Patagonia, offering stunning glaciers and trekking as the warm season begins.

monthly.name: New Orleans
monthly.description: Enjoy mild weather perfect for jazz, Creole cuisine, and exploring the historic French Quarter before peak season.

unique.name: Jukkasjärvi
unique.description: Stay at the world-famous ICEHOTEL, carved entirely from snow and ice, offering a truly unique arctic experience.

unique.name: Kaikoura
unique.description: Sleep in a luxury treehouse at Hapuku Lodge, nestled in native forests with stunning ocean and mountain views.

unique.name: Goreme
unique.description: Experience a stay in a historic cave hotel, carved into ancient rock formations of Cappadocia.

unique.name: Pemba Island
unique.description: Dive into luxury at The Manta Resort's Underwater Room, sleeping surrounded by marine life.

unique.name: Baja California
unique.description: Stargaze from a transparent bubble dome at Campera Hotel Burbuja, amidst vineyards.

unique.name: Uluru
unique.description: Luxury glamping at Longitude 131°, with private tents overlooking the iconic Uluru in the Outback.
